original_title: 夜明け前のうた 消された沖縄の障害者
overview: Incarcerating the mentally ill in sheds and other private enclosures was permitted under Japanese law and continued in Okinawa until 1972. The film leads us to hear the unheard song of victims of this cruel system of social isolation.
title: Singing in the Dark: Erasing the Disabled of Okinawa
